data.name: demog_heading
data.value: Demographics

data.name: demog_instr
data.value: Items in red are required

data.name: demog_rptnote
data.value: REMINDER: You will receive your report(s) via email after the due date and prior to your course date. Please complete all tasks in the main menu prior to the deadline provided.

data.name: demog_valsumm1
data.value: Please answer the following questions.

data.name: health_heading
data.value: Health Profile

data.name: health_hour
data.value: hour

data.name: health_hours
data.value: hours

data.name: health_q16_1
data.value: Think about days you were limited in the amount or kind of work you could do, days you accomplished less than you would like, or days you could not do your work as carefully as usual. If low or negative energy affected your work only a little, choose a low number. Choose a high number if low or negative energy affected your work a great deal.

data.name: health_q16_2
data.value: Consider only how much low (or negative) energy affected productivity <u>while you were working. </u>

data.name: health_q17_1
data.value: By regular activities, we mean the usual activities you do, such as work around the house, shopping, childcare, exercising, studying, etc. Think about times you were limited in the amount or kind of activities you could do and times you accomplished less than you would like. If health problems affected your activities only a little, choose a low number. Choose a high number if health problems affected your activities a great deal.

data.name: health_q17_2
data.value: Consider only how much <u>low or negative energy levels</u> affected your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job.

data.name: register_addheading
data.value: Add raters

data.name: register_bullet1
data.value:
Recommended volume of raters is 5 or more, as follows:
  • Supervisor/manager: 1 (minimum )
  • Peers: 2 or more
  • Direct reports: 2 or more
  • Friends/Family: any
  • Children: any

data.name: register_bullet2
data.value: If you do not have a minimum of 2 peers and 2 direct reports, the categories are combined in your report to preserve anonymity.

data.name: register_bullet3
data.value: Children questions are targeted at ages 7-18, and answer 6 questions designed for that age group. Any child over 18 is recommended to select "Family Member" to take the in-depth question set.

data.name: register_bullet4
data.value: You may use your own email address for children, if they don’t have one. Once they login, they should choose "child" as their relationship to you.

data.name: register_currentheading
data.value: Current Raters

data.name: register_detail1

data.value: All Responses Due by

data.value: Email Address

data.name: register_firstname
data.value: First Name

data.name: register_groupheading
data.value: Register to access the Seven Tudes

data.name: register_ch_groupheading
data.value: Register to access the NorthStar Assessment

data.name: register_heading
data.value: Register Raters

data.name: register_instr
data.value: Please select the persons you would like to provide feedback for your 360 Seven Tudes. The raters you select will receive a subset of the questions asked of you. The questions they receive are based on their relationship to you, work-related versus friends & family. For example, personal habit-related items like nutrition or exercise are only asked of friends and family. There is no maximum on the number of raters, so please register as many as you would like.

data.name: register_instr2
data.value: <u>INSTRUCTIONS: </u>Enter the required information for each person, and click “Save (send emails)”. The system will then send out the invitation to the raters selected.

data.name: register_lastname
data.value: Last Name

data.name: register_maxdate
data.value: Reminders Sent

data.name: register_nocurrentdata
data.value: You don't have any raters registered at this time.

data.name: register_note2
data.value: Please Note: Email addresses ending with att.com, shaw.ca and sbcglobal.net may have difficulty in receiving these emails. To ensure delivery of the information, please utilize email addresses outside these domains, if possible.

data.name: register_note3
data.value: Automated reminders are sent to any rater who has <u>not</u> provided feedback by the response deadline.

data.name: register_previewemails
data.value: Preview Emails

data.name: register_reminders
data.value: Automatic reminder emails will be sent to any rater who has not provided feedback by the response deadline above. The date the most recent reminders were sent is shown below. You may choose to send reminders yourself by clicking on ’Send Reminders’.

data.name: register_reminders2
data.value: The most recent date that reminders were sent is displayed to the left. If you would like to send reminders yourself, simply click on the “Send Reminders” button. Reminders are sent only to those who have not completed their survey.

data.name: rel_instr3
data.value: * Most questions are multiple choice and those responses are reported in aggregate. Responses to open-ended (write in) questions may be identifiable as your response by the person you are rating based on the specifics of what you state in your response.

data.name: consent_agree
data.value: I agree

data.name: consent_disagree
data.value: I do not agree

data.name: consent_finaltext
data.value: I have read and consent to the these terms and those detailed in the Privacy Statement and Legal Notice, and to the processing of personal information in the United States and other locations where data protection rules may differ from those of the country in which I reside.

data.name: consent_heading
data.value: Consent Form

data.name: consent_no
data.value: We are sorry. If you change your mind, please login again.

data.name: consentrater_para1
data.value: Thank you for agreeing to provide survey responses for a participant in our courses.

data.name: consentrater_para2
data.value: Human Performance Institute Division of Wellness & Prevention, Inc. (“Wellness & Prevention”) provides this website and survey for the purpose of preparing individuals for our energy and performance programs (the “Program”). We understand that the information you will be sharing about the Program participant may be very personal. This Privacy Notice is designed to tell you about Wellness & Prevention’s practices regarding collection, use, and disclosure of the information you provide.

data.name: consentrater_para3
data.value: By completing these survey questions, you consent to the collection, processing, retention, and disclosure of the responses (e.g., related to the participant’s behavioral and lifestyle information, and other information that you provide us) by Wellness & Prevention, our business partners, and our service providers, together who use this information to administer the Program. We will not otherwise sell or give information you provide to other parties for purposes unrelated to the Program.

data.name: consentrater_para4
data.value: Wellness & Prevention takes reasonable steps to protect such information from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

data.name: consentrater_para5
data.value: You may reach us with questions and for other support regarding this survey by contacting:

data.name: consentrater_para6
data.value: Human Performance Institute Division of Wellness & Prevention, Inc. 9757 Lake Nona Rd. Orlando, FL 32827 USA +1.407.438.9911   info@corporateathlete.com

data.name: consentrater_para7
data.value: More information about our overall privacy practices, you may review our Program Privacy Statement. Use of this website is governed by its Legal Notice.

data.name: consentself_bullet1
data.value: Human Performance Institute Division of Wellness & Prevention, Inc., will keep information about me private, and will not voluntarily disclose the information except as described in the Privacy Statement.

data.name: consentself_bullet2
data.value: Information about me may be provided to the coaches supporting me related to these energy and performance programs.

data.name: consentself_bullet3
data.value: Wellness & Prevention may provide de-identified aggregate and statistical information about its participants:

data.name: consentself_bullet3a
data.value: To my sponsor (if applicable) and other supporting organizations for administering the programs

data.name: consentself_bullet3b
data.value: To other parties for their analysis and research.

data.name: consentself_bullet4
data.value: Wellness & Prevention and supporting organizations may contact me with program information and requests.

data.name: consentself_intro
data.value: Please carefully read the following along with our Privacy Statement and Legal Notice, as participation in the various Human Performance Institute programs require that you fully understand and consent to these terms:

data.name: prev_rater_header
data.value: Select Previous Raters.

data.name: prev_rater_addnew
data.value: Add Raters

data.name: prev_rater_instr
data.value: On the next two pages you will select the people who you would like to give feedback for your 360 Seven Tudes. The raters will receive a subset of the questions asked of you. The questions they receive are based on their relationship to you, work-related versus friends and family.

data.name: prev_rater_instr2
data.value: This page shows all the raters that you had selected for your previous 360. We highly encourage you to select all of these raters again. However, you are not required to do so. You will have the opportunity to add additional raters on the following screen. Please review the list of previous raters below and select those you would like to participate in this assessment. When finished, click Next to continue.

data.name: prev_rater_next_alert
data.value: Please review your selections. You will not be able to return to this screen.

data.name: default_instr_t2
data.value: Please use the codes you have been provided to begin your Seven Tudes

data.name: default_participants_t2
data.value: The Seven Tudes is the Human Performance Institute’s most comprehensive online assessment tool. The profile focuses on behaviors in each of the four energy dimensions (physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual). It provides awareness of strengths as well as uncovers opportunities for growth in each energy dimension.

data.name: thanks_rater_ch
data.value: Thank you for completing the Northstar Assessment. Your responses will be combined with those from other raters and included in this person's feedback report.

data.name: default_instr_ch
data.value: Please use the codes provided to you to begin your assessment.

data.name: default_heading_ch
data.value: Welcome to the NorthStar Assessment

data.name: default_participants_ch
data.value: We are excited about your upcoming training with the Human Performance Institute. The assessment(s) you will be completing are an integral part of the training you will be attending.
